document_data.name: Acid Fog
document_data.Users: ''Acid fog'' could be cast by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s, as well as [[cleric]]s who commanded the [[Water domain]].
document_data.Effects: The spell was similar in effect to a ''[[solid fog]]'' spell, but the mists it produced were also highly corrosive to any creature or item caught within it. The spell was able to damage the hull of a [[spelljammer]].
document_data.Components: Like ''solid fog'', a casting of ''acid fog'' required a mixture of a pinch of powdered hoof from some animal, and a pinch of powdered dried peas.
document_data.Crafting: This spell was one of several that could be used in the crafting of ''[[acidic burst]]'' weapons.
document_data.History: This spell, together with the less powerful but similar ''[[stinking cloud]]'', was invented by the [[Netheril|Netherese]] [[arcanist]] [[Tolodine]] in {{Yearlink|-2363}}, early in the history of [[Netheril]].
